by.tc.auction.dao.user_operation

Interface UserOperationDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserOperationDAOImpl

    public interface UserOperationDAO
    An interface of user operations. An interface provides methods of user operations in an application source.
    Author:
    semenovich

    • Method Detail

      • placeBet

        boolean placeBet(Auction auction,
                 java.lang.String userLogin,
                 Bet bet,
                 java.sql.Timestamp betTime)
          throws DAOException
        Places bet.
        Parameters:
        auction - - an auction in which bet will be placed.
        userLogin - - a login of user which has placed bet.
        bet - - a bet.
        betTime - - time when bet was placed.
        Returns:
        true - if a bet has been placed. false - if a bet hasn't been placed.
        Throws:
        DAOException - - if an error occurred during operation.

      • payForLot

        boolean payForLot(java.lang.Integer auctionId,
                  java.lang.Integer lotId)
           throws DAOException
        Pays for lot.
        Parameters:
        auctionId - - an ID of an auction for which lot a user pays.
        lotId - - an ID of lot for which a user pays.
        Returns:
        true - if successful. false - if not successful.
        Throws:
        DAOException - - if an error occurred during operation.

      • getAuctionCurrentBet

        Bet getAuctionCurrentBet(Auction auction)
                  throws DAOException
        Returns an auction current bet.
        Parameters:
        auction - - an auction.
        Returns:
        An auction current bet. null if an auction doesn't exist.
        Throws:
        DAOException - - if an error occurred during operation.
